aka: 超級太空望遠鏡：勇闖宇宙邊際(港)
this_title: Super Telescope: Mission To The Edge of The Universe
trans_title: 超级望远镜韦伯：宇宙拓边使命
超級太空望遠鏡：勇闖宇宙邊際(港)
introduction: The inside story of the James Webb Space Telescope, following the Nasa team building the £8 billion device and the scientists taking its first image of distant stars and galaxies.
chinese_title: 超级望远镜韦伯：宇宙拓边使命
foreign_title: Super Telescope: Mission To The Edge of The Universe
